name: shattered reality (itch)
description:
shattered reality is a game where you have different abilities this ability are infinite but using too much creates side effects. We spent like 12 hours on the last day to make most of the game.

controls
A and D to move left and right
W or SPACE to jump
Q to switch abiltes (dont work)
left mouse button to shot

There are a lot of bugs in the currenet build.  (abilty changer not working and heath system)
